name: HYBRD
headline: Strava for the modern athlete
description:
HYBRD is Strava for modern athletes who do more than just cardio. It brings all your training data together by integrating with top wearables and uses AI to make tracking weightlifting easy. This allows athletes to fully understand their training load, track holistic progress over time, and compete with friends in fresh, exciting ways.

Existing products tend to focus on only one type of exercise‚Äîeither cardio or strength‚Äîleaving hybrid athletes juggling disconnected tools. As hybrid athletes themselves the founders found this frustrating and set out to build the unified approach they needed for their training.

Three of HYBRD‚Äôs founders previously worked at WHOOP, each leading teams across product, growth and analytics. In parallel, Mats was a member of the US national rowing team and Ben, Shoe and Ruiters have all completed Ironman 70.3s.
tags: industry:consumer; industry:fitness; industry:social; industry:digital-health; industry:ai; location:boston

founders.name: Ben Katz, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO of HYBRD. Previously led the growth product team at WHOOP and the fitness app portfolio at Appex. In my free time I train as a hybrid athlete, having completed a 50k ultramarathon, an Ironman 70.3, and am currently preparing for my first full Ironman.

founders.name: Matt Ruiters, Founder
founders.description:
üáøüá¶ Co-Founder & CTO @ HYBRD, the Strava for elite athletes.  Exercise and cooking keep me sane. Loved playing rugby, but since my shoulders gave out, I've gotten into triathlon and surfing. 

Previously was a senior tech lead at AWS, where I led teams of 10-15 engineers. He delivered features in Billing and Amazon Connect that drove millions of dollars in revenue and won strategic customers. He has played on the USA Rugby team and has completed two Ironman 70.3s.

Let's ship.

founders.name: Caroline "Shoe" Shoemaker, Founder
founders.description: Shoe has had years of experience in the fitness tech space, first at WHOOP building their analytics team, then at Appex, a mobile app roll-up company responsible for 1/2 the portfolio. Now she's focused on building HYBRD, the Strava for elite athletes while training for an Ironman in 2025.

founders.name: Mats Terwiesch, Founder
founders.description:
At HYBRD, I‚Äôm focused on core product and sport science. 

I previously was an early employee and product manager at WHOOP, where I launched the Strength Trainer feature and expanded free trials internationally. 

I also have experience leading product management for the fitness vertical of a profitable mobile app roll-up, and was a research associate publishing on health and artificial intelligence at Harvard. 

In parallel to my tech career, I was a member of the US national rowing team.

# Achieve peak performance as a hybrid athlete
HYBRD is the app designed to help hybrid athletes track, manage, and optimize their training.
[Become a Member](https://www.hybrd.app/<https:/hybrd.typeform.com/to/tQhm9TWK?>)
### Understand your training better than you ever have
"Being a HYBRD founding member has been an endurance athlete's dream. The passion and drive of the HYBRD community is unmatched and it‚Äôs remarkable to suggest product features and see them pushed as an update within hours!‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/673abb736afd64c0cd56029d_AF2F47BE-FA12-4949-9158-49733C02E87A%202.png)
Dave Scanlan
Ironman | Training for the grand traverse
"HYBRD transformed the way I track my workouts. It's great to have everything in one place and it has given me a whole new way to compete with friends."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/673a7fafe7e75e76b0ee91a2_IMG_4431%20\(2\)%202.png)
Jon Thurman
US Army Vet | 625 lb deadlift
"HYBRD motivates my cross training by tracking my overall fitness. This app gets that every serious athlete is a multi-sport athlete."‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/673c21617bc5618d1544a0fa_Screenshot%202024-11-18%20at%2021.20.22%201.png)
Jordi Cabanas
Former D1 rower | Junior national champ
"HYBRD transformed the way I track my workouts, opening up actionable insights and new ways to compete with friends"‍‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/673abc0af4aef1c1a4793944_image%20\(7\)%202.png)
Sam Gibbons
Ironman | Training to row across the Atlantic

All your training
In one place
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66cdce2121c3af7a4f4eac0c_Circle%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a5d_Dash%20Border.svg)
Trying to solve that puzzle with scattered training data is nearly impossible.HYBRD brings all your training data into one place, no matter where you track it, and uses it to provide unique insights that help you optimize your performance and surpass your goals.
# The future of hybrid training
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67a3b0824e286dbb9d522f9e_IMG_7522.png)
### All your workouts in one place
Seamlessly aggregate all of your workouts into one place for a full picture of performance.
### Fully understand performance
Compare your performance relative to people of the same age, weight, and gender.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67a3b0af8d33d3476b0c0c0b_IMG_7521.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67a3a707369370c0a93aa6d4_IMG_7518.png)
### Frictionless AI lift logging
Take a photo, voice record the workout, or just type in what you did.
### Integrate with your favorite tools
We love our favorite tools too, so we made sure yours work with HYBRD.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/679a3cd0d0ef6d5e95654cee_IMG_7360.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67a3a7077decaced44f741ae_IMG_7519.png)
### Deep workout analytics
Unique metrics designed to help you get more out of your workouts.
### Analyze trends over time
See how your training is adding up on a longer time scale.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67a3a707ad13ef48854465b0_IMG_7520.png)
# The future of hybrid training
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67396ec9bdf24ec703423414_IMG_6589.png)
### All your workouts in one place
Seamlessly aggregate all of your workouts into one place for a full picture of your training.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67396ed3527eda8f247c1765_IMG_6592.png)
### Fully understand performance
Compare your performance relative to people of the same age, weight, and gender.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67396ecfd03eccef6cc5a34b_IMG_6591.png)
### Frictionless AI lift logging
Take a photo, voice record the workout, or just type in what you did.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67396ed5d8b2c3539dff0d9b_IMG_6593.png)
### Integrate with your favorite tools
We love our favorite tools too, so we made sure yours work with HYBRD.
### Frequently Asked Questions
If you have a question that isn't listed here, shoot us a note at support@hybrd.app.
How can I get access?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
HYBRD is currently invitation only, but we are accepting applications from athletes that combine both strength and cardio and take their training seriously. ‍If this sounds like you, apply to be a member; we'd love to get your feedback on how we can build the perfect product for your training.
What integrations do you support?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
We integrate with Apple Health, WHOOP, Garmin, Coros, Wahoo, Strava, Zwift, and more.
How much will it cost?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
HYBRD membership costs $149/year.
Is HYBRD available on both iOS and Android?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
We are currently iOS only but Android is on the roadmap.
How is HYBRD different from Strava?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
HYBRD is designed to create actionable training insights for hybrid athletes who train both strength and cardio simultaneously. We use this aggregated picture of your fitness to unlock new ways for friends to compete with their fitness, even if they're not all training in the same sports.
How is HYBRD's approach different?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
To truly understand performance you need to have a full picture of an athlete's training. HYBRD is the only app that pulls all workouts across strength and cardio into one place and actually uses that full picture to provide unique insights on your training.
### Ready to take your training to the next level?
[Become a Member](https://www.hybrd.app/<https:/hybrd.typeform.com/to/tQhm9TWK>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66cdcddb4f120d4983f31524_Right%20Blur%20\(2\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66cdce060487371be9bd58a5_Left%20Blur%20\(3\).png)

### All your workouts in one place
Seamlessly aggregate all of your workouts into one place for a full picture of your training.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67396ed3527eda8f247c1765_IMG_6592.png)
### Fully understand performance
Compare your performance relative to people of the same age, weight, and gender.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67396ecfd03eccef6cc5a34b_IMG_6591.png)
### Frictionless AI lift logging
Take a photo, voice record the workout, or just type in what you did.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/67396ed5d8b2c3539dff0d9b_IMG_6593.png)
### Integrate with your favorite tools
We love our favorite tools too, so we made sure yours work with HYBRD.
### Frequently Asked Questions
If you have a question that isn't listed here, shoot us a note at support@hybrd.app.
How can I get access?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
HYBRD is currently invitation only, but we are accepting applications from athletes that combine both strength and cardio and take their training seriously. ‍If this sounds like you, apply to be a member; we'd love to get your feedback on how we can build the perfect product for your training.
What integrations do you support?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
We integrate with Apple Health, WHOOP, Garmin, Coros, Wahoo, Strava, Zwift, and more.
How much will it cost?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
HYBRD membership costs $149/year.
Is HYBRD available on both iOS and Android?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
We are currently iOS only but Android is on the roadmap.
How is HYBRD different from Strava?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
HYBRD is designed to create actionable training insights for hybrid athletes who train both strength and cardio simultaneously. We use this aggregated picture of your fitness to unlock new ways for friends to compete with their fitness, even if they're not all training in the same sports.
How is HYBRD's approach different?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a68_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66a792affeadfe95a2ef4a69_Minus.svg)
To truly understand performance you need to have a full picture of an athlete's training. HYBRD is the only app that pulls all workouts across strength and cardio into one place and actually uses that full picture to provide unique insights on your training.
### Ready to take your training to the next level?
Become a Member‚ü®9‚ü©
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66cdcddb4f120d4983f31524_Right%20Blur%20\(2\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a792affeadfe95a2ef49e8/66cdce060487371be9bd58a5_Left%20Blur%20\(3\).png)

generated_description:
**HYBRD: Revolutionizing Training for Hybrid Athletes**

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2024 and hailing from Boston, HYBRD describes itself as "Strava for the modern athlete." It targets hybrid athletes who juggle strength and cardio training, providing them with an integrated platform for tracking workouts across different disciplines. The company is part of Y Combinator's Batch F24 and is backed by Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner.

**Mission:**  
HYBRD's mission is clear: unify the fragmented fitness tools available today. Most existing fitness apps focus solely on cardio or strength training, which often leaves hybrid athletes scrambling between multiple tools. HYBRD aims to collect all training data‚Äîwhether from weightlifting, running, or other activities‚Äîinto one place, leveraging AI to simplify the tracking of workouts.

**The Founders:**  
The founding team combines expertise with practical experience; three founders previously worked at WHOOP, specializing in product development, growth, and analytics. They are athletes themselves, with experiences that range from rowing on the US national team to competing in Ironman 70.3s.

**Product Features:**
- **Comprehensive Tracking:** HYBRD aggregates data from various wearables, enabling users to see their workout performance holistically.
- **AI Insights:** It uses AI to streamline weightlifting logs, making it easier for users to record their workouts through voice, photos, or text.
- **Engaged Community:** Users are encouraged to compete with friends in innovative ways, transforming the way they approach fitness and motivation.
- **Integration:** Compatible with popular fitness tools and platforms such as Apple Health, WHOOP, Strava, and more, it ensures users can easily incorporate HYBRD into their existing routines.

**User Experience:**  
Feedback from early members indicates a strong community engagement and a sense of personalization‚Äîmany users have reported quickly seeing their suggested features implemented. Athletes appreciate having their various metrics and workouts in one consolidated space. This not only simplifies tracking but also enriches their training experience.

**Current Status:**  
HYBRD is currently operating as an invitation-only platform, charging a membership fee of $149 per year. It's available on iOS, with plans for an Android release down the line. 

For those looking to elevate their training regimen and gain unique insights into their performance, HYBRD is positioned as a pioneering force in the realm of hybrid athletics.

**Explore more** at [HYBRD‚Äôs website](https://www.hybrd.app/).
